channel.title: San Francisco Digital Services
channel.description: Recent content on San Francisco Digital Services

item.description: Come Build a Digital City We’re Hiring Technologists Read the Full Report (PDF) -- Overview -- In these roles, you'll help change culture and practices. You'll need to roll up your sleeves to work on the development, operation, and improvement of complex digital services. As part of this new team, you’d have an opportunity to shape the City’s approach to digital services. Over the next few months we will be hiring up to a dozen people for roles in Engineering, Design, Product, and Communications.

Our Team San Francisco Digital Services Read the Full Report (PDF) -- About -- The San Francisco Digital Services Team is transforming how residents interact with the City. We're doing this by building services designed around the people that use them. Led by the Chief Digital Services Officer, our team includes: product managers designers business analysts developers content strategists We believe in four principles: Put the needs of residents first Focus on delivery and outcomes over process Create an agile and data driven culture Make City services accessible to everyone.

San Francisco Digital Services Making Services For Everyone Read the Full Report (PDF) -- About -- San Francisco Digital Services works with other City departments to improve public services. We use technology to make it easier for people to get things done. We're working on critical issues like affordable housing, small businesses, legal aid for immigrants, and more. Our team is also rebuilding the city’s website from the ground up.

Public Participation Share your voice in our research studies Do you live or work in San Francisco? Take part in our research studies to improve City services. Sign up below to get notified when we have research studies. When there is an upcoming study, we’ll send you an email with the details and a link to let us know if you’re interested. Within a week or two, you’ll find out if you were selected to participate.

A single website for San Franciscans San Francisco Digital Services Strategy -- Read the Full Report (PDF) -- About -- We’re building a new website for San Francisco. Right now, we have 210 websites across the City with over 300,000 pages. But getting services from the City is frequently difficult and confusing. With so much information, residents don’t know which pages to trust. They might have to visit multiple sites to accomplish a task.

Serving You Better San Francisco Digital Services Strategy Read the Full Report (PDF) -- About -- Imagine a city where a teenager in the Bayview can search for a summer internship from his cell phone, allowing him to gain valuable job training for a future career. Or a family in the Mission can apply for health insurance from a computer at their local library. Or where an aspiring café owner can apply for and track every permit for her business from her home office.
